import org.ow2.proactive.scheduler.task.SchedulerVars println "forkEnvironmentScript" println variables println genericInformation
def check_defined_var = { name -> if (variables.get(name) == null) { throw new IllegalStateException("Undefined variable: " + name); }} def check_var_equals = { name, value -> if (!value.equals(variables.get(name))) { throw new IllegalStateException("Wrong value for variable " + name + ": "+ value); }} def check_gi_equals = { name, value -> if (!value.equals(genericInformation.get(name))) { throw new IllegalStateException("Wrong value for generic information " + name + ": "+ value); }} check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_JOB_ID.toString()) check_var_equals(SchedulerVars.PA_JOB_NAME.toString(), "Job_variables") check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_TASK_ID.toString()) check_var_equals(SchedulerVars.PA_TASK_NAME.toString(), "taskVariables") check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_TASK_ITERATION.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_TASK_REPLICATION.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_USER.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_SCHEDULER_HOME.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_NODE_URL.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_NODE_NAME.toString()) check_defined_var(SchedulerVars.PA_NODE_HOST.toString()) check_var_equals(SchedulerVars.PA_SCHEDULER_REST_URL.toString(), "http://localhost:8080/rest") check_var_equals("TESTVAR","testvar") check_gi_equals("TESTGI","testgi") check_gi_equals("TESTGI2","testgi2")
